Title: Directs the study of the health and environmental impact of the implementation of 5G and future generation wireless network system technology and small cell distributed antenna systems in the state
Summary: Directs the study of the health and environmental impact of the implementation of 5G and future generation wireless network system technology and small cell distributed antenna systems in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the study of the health and environmental impacts of the implementation of 5G and future generation wireless network system technology and small cell distributed antenna systems in the state
